::: Hell Beast looks to Double punch and his associate, ::: Orders? I want 
you to go and get me as much information on this new Maximal ship as you can. 
Wepon placements, entry's, and anything else. 

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron looked down at his small time keeping device. Ra had been gone 
for 15 minutes now. They could see him getting into the Ark, but that was 10 
minutes before. :::

::: Megatron ::: What is keeping him?!!!

::: Waspinator ::: Autobots are heavy.

::: Megatron glared ::: Good deduction. But, he should have reported back if 
he got Prime or not!

::: Waspinator scratched his head ::: Why do we need Autobot leader agian?

::: Megatron shighed ::: To hold him hostage! That way, we can ensure the 
MAximals destruction and the Predacons takeover of the Galaxy!

::: Waspinator ::: Oh yeah!
